name: Dreamland
description: A teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist.

review.author: ahmadjassim-06226
review.heading: Finally a good movie
review.reviewBody: The film was beautiful and the acting was also beautiful and the director played a nice role in this film, but the story and writing could have been better, but the film in general was beautiful and I nominated Margot Robbie for the Oscar. Her acting was wonderful.

keywords: bullet wound,dust storm,bank robbery,shot in the back,shot in the leg
